analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a search (magnifying glass) icon as SVG, allowing the stroke color to be customized via a `fill` prop.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, configurable search icon throughout the application’s UI—part of the navigation icon set under the `modules/icons/navigation` directory.

Components.name: IconSearch
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG search icon (circle with handle) and exposes a `fill` prop to control stroke color. Passes through any additional attributes (e.g. CSS classes) via `$attrs`.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines component props in `<script setup>` context.

fill.description: Stroke color of the icon; defaults to a CSS variable for black.

analysis.Usage:
Import and register the component where needed:

```js
import IconSearch from '@/modules/icons/navigation/IconSearch.vue'
```

Then use in templates:

```html
<IconSearch fill="#333" class="icon-size-large" />
```
Notes: No `<style>` section—styling is driven by SVG attributes and external CSS classes.
Uses `$attrs.class` to forward any class bindings directly onto both `<path>` elements.
Because it’s pure SVG, it has no interactivity or state beyond the color prop.
Falls back to a CSS variable for color, ensuring theme consistency.
